title: debate

agents.name: Agent A - Judge
responsibilities: Evaluate arguments from both sides and decide which is stronger.
input: Claims and rebuttals from the debaters.
output: A winner plus a brief justification.

example_output.rationale: Pro provided more evidence and addressed counterpoints.

agents.name: Agent B - Moderator
responsibilities: Define the debate structure and assign turns.
input: The debate question and any constraints.
output: A turn plan for pro and con arguments.

agents.name: Agent B-2 - Pro Debater
responsibilities: Present the strongest case for the affirmative position.
input: Debate prompt and any supporting facts.
output: A concise pro argument with evidence.

agents.name: Agent B-3 - Con Debater
responsibilities: Present the strongest case for the opposing position.
input: Debate prompt and any supporting facts.
output: A concise con argument with evidence.

agents.name: Agent B-4 - Rebuttal (Pro)
responsibilities: Rebut the con argument and reinforce the pro case.
output: A short rebuttal from the pro side.

agents.name: Agent B-5 - Rebuttal (Con)
responsibilities: Rebut the pro argument and reinforce the con case.
output: A short rebuttal from the con side.

execution_flow: Moderator assigns pro and con roles.
Pro and con present opening arguments.
Judge selects the stronger argument and explains why.

ui_defaults.prompt: Debate the question: Should cities ban private cars in downtown areas?

agentA.contract: Judge the debate and decide the stronger case.

agentB.contract: Moderate the debate and assign pro/con roles.

workers.contract: Present the pro argument with evidence.
Present the con argument with evidence.
Rebut the con argument from the pro side.
Rebut the pro argument from the con side.
